feedback.subject: Feedback for Recall
feedback.body:
Hi,

I have some feedback about Recall:

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Recall is built with privacy as a core principle. We believe your personal relationships and the information you record about them should remain private and under your control.

localStorage.title: 100% Local Storage
localStorage.description: All your contact data, notes, facts, and memories are stored exclusively on your device in a secure local database. Your data never leaves your phone without your explicit action.

dataSovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
dataSovereignty.description: You have complete ownership of your data. Export it anytime in JSON or CSV format. Delete it whenever you want. No cloud storage, no data mining, no third-party access.

aiProcessing.title: AI Processing
aiProcessing.description: Voice transcription and text analysis are processed through secure APIs only when you record. The processed content is stored locally and is never used to train AI models.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Questions about your privacy or data? We're here to help.

languagePicker.title: Choose language
languagePicker.description: This language will be used for the interface and voice transcription
